Class LoggingCacheListener<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cacheRunner.LoggingCacheCallback
      • cacheRunner.LoggingCacheListener<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client.SubscriberListener

    public class LoggingCacheListener<K,V>
extends LoggingCacheCallback
implements CacheListener<K,V>
    A CacheListener that logs information about the events it receives.

    4.0
